Our Specialties

  • To provide the lowest tuition fees for local and foreign students and special offer for the students of SAARC country.
  • Quality education, support counseling center to provide job related information available at all time in all the campuses.
  • To recognize and solve problems independently by applying scientific concepts of airlines cost management, airport planning and cargo management etc.
  • To provide education loan facilities and residence facilities.
  • 300 days internships in airlines and credit transfer facilities in Bangladesh and different foreign countries.

Facilities in the college building

  • Own Campus

    UCA has her own six storey centrally air cooled state of art campus in Dhaka, the capital of Bangladesh, having international standard class rooms, common rooms, strong rooms, cafeteria, cyber cafe, own power station etc.Beside the main campus it has another building to run international department and conduct classes which is named ANNEX- Bhaban

  • Widespread Library

    The university has an air-conditioned and spacious library with sufficient textbook, reference book, journal and other reading materials. The students have free access to the library for study and they can borrow books for study at home. The library is working on its more than 10,000 e-books right now.

  • All time electricity And WI-FI zone

    The college building is facilitated with all time electricity availability and the whole campus is a Wi-Fi zone with high speed internet bandwidth.

  • Modern Laboratories

    Laboratories for Aeronautical Engineering & Science are very expensive. The University is trying to fulfill all the laboratories by the year 2014. So far the UCA has completed six laboratories. With the arrival of huge amount of aircraft parts, spares, equipment and component from Netherland in Mar2013, UCA now claim to have a full pledged practical lab to meet all necessary requirements. It already has a DC-10 Engine for practical use. The laboratory of CSE department is already completed. UCA has Language lab as well. UCASM has newly introduced a laboratory for culinary arts practical with a well furnished kitchen.

  • Technologies

    The college building is equipped with many computer labs, including specialist games technology. These resources are accompanied by specific software, allowing student to enhance their skills. UCASM has its own management software to maintain organizational activities, behavior and institutional repository. Classrooms are fitted with Audio-Visual technology, allowing teachers to control multiple display screens to project teaching materials, studentsâ€™ work and electronic design. Very recently UCASM has started using time control punch machine through which studentâ€™s attendance, late present information along with faculty and staffâ€™s information are kept and maintained digitally.

  • Indoor Games

    To remove dullness of mind and keep fit the students, UCASM has so many indoor game items, like- keram board, chess and others.

  • Student Accommodation

    It is a growing demand for every educational institution to have accommodation facilities for the student. UCASM measure this with high value and provides extensive care.Our college is situated in a prominent area of Dhaka city, located at Sec-3, Uttara.We have many outer district and foreign students at our institution came for their best education. So we have big challenge to accommodate them in a better and safer domicile. This is why we have boys and girls hostel within walking distance to college campus.

    Accommodation expenses as low as 5,500 BDT (Approximately)

    • Accommodation Facilities

      • Large rooms with modern decoration.
      • Sufficient lights and ventilation.
      • Clean and Tidy.
      • Hall room equipped with television and furnished sitting arrangements.
      • Indoor and outdoor games facilities and so on.

  • Scholarship And Credit Transfer

    Waver is given to every student on the basis of their knowledge and results. College authority is also kind enough to meritorious but poor students and given scholarship to those students. Also student can transfer credit to abroad to continue their study.

  • Internship And Industrial Tour

    Regent Airways is our corporate partner to whom our students are doing internship. Beside this to make students practically skilled enough college authority also under taking students to different industrial tour, very recently students visited Makalu Airlines, Nepal.

  • Job Facilities

    There is a wide spread job placement facilities within 110 countries in the world. Besides, excellent students can build their career in different airlines of Bangladesh and these jobs are very prestigious also.
